name: intel-oneapi-tbb
description:
Intel oneAPI TBB. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and using this
software, you agree to the terms and conditions of the software license
agreements at https://intel.ly/393CijO.

dependent_to.name: root
dependent_to.description: ROOT is a data analysis framework.

dependent_to.name: salmon
dependent_to.description:
Salmon is a tool for quantifying the expression of transcripts using
RNA-seq data.

dependent_to.name: libmesh
dependent_to.description:
The libMesh library provides a framework for the numerical simulation of
partial differential equations using arbitrary unstructured
discretizations on serial and parallel platforms.

dependent_to.name: hpx
dependent_to.description: C++ runtime system for parallel and distributed applications.

dependent_to.name: dyninst
dependent_to.description:
API for dynamic binary instrumentation. Modify programs while they are
executing without recompiling, re-linking, or re-executing.

dependent_to.name: suite-sparse
dependent_to.description: SuiteSparse is a suite of sparse matrix algorithms

dependent_to.name: kassiopeia
dependent_to.description: Simulation of electric and magnetic fields and particle tracking.

dependent_to.name: bowtie2
dependent_to.description:
Bowtie 2 is an ultrafast and memory-efficient tool for aligning
sequencing reads to long reference sequences

dependent_to.name: rocksdb
dependent_to.description: RocksDB: A Persistent Key-Value Store for Flash and RAM Storage

dependent_to.name: oce
dependent_to.description:
Open CASCADE Community Edition: patches/improvements/experiments
contributed by users over the official Open CASCADE library.

dependent_to.name: relion
dependent_to.description:
RELION (for REgularised LIkelihood OptimisatioN, pronounce rely-on) is a
stand-alone computer program that employs an empirical Bayesian approach
to refinement of (multiple) 3D reconstructions or 2D class averages in
electron cryo-microscopy (cryo-EM).

dependent_to.name: r-rcppparallel
dependent_to.description:
Parallel Programming Tools for 'Rcpp'. High level functions for parallel
programming with 'Rcpp'. For example, the 'parallelFor()' function can
be used to convert the work of a standard serial "for" loop into a
parallel one and the 'parallelReduce()' function can be used for
accumulating aggregate or other values.

dependent_to.name: pmemkv
dependent_to.description:
pmemkv is a local/embedded key-value datastore, optimized for persistent
memory.

dependent_to.name: geant4
dependent_to.description:
Geant4 is a toolkit for the simulation of the passage of particles
through matter. Its areas of application include high energy, nuclear
and accelerator physics, as well as studies in medical and space
science.

dependent_to.name: opencv
dependent_to.description:
OpenCV (Open Source Computer Vision Library) is an open source computer
vision and machine learning software library.

dependent_to.name: vtk-m
dependent_to.description:
VTK-m is a toolkit of scientific visualization algorithms for emerging
processor architectures. VTK-m supports the fine-grained concurrency for
data analysis and visualization algorithms required to drive extreme
scale computing by providing abstract models for data and execution that
can be applied to a variety of algorithms across many different
processor architectures.

dependent_to.name: onednn
dependent_to.description:
oneAPI Deep Neural Network Library (oneDNN). Formerly known as Intel
MKL-DNN and DNNL.

dependent_to.name: bowtie
dependent_to.description:
Bowtie is an ultrafast, memory-efficient short read aligner for short
DNA sequences (reads) from next-gen sequencers.

dependent_to.name: dealii
dependent_to.description:
C++ software library providing well-documented tools to build finite
element codes for a broad variety of PDEs.

dependent_to.name: embree
dependent_to.description: Intel Embree High Performance Ray Tracing Kernels

dependent_to.name: sailfish
dependent_to.description: Sailfish is a tool for transcript quantification from RNA-seq data.

dependent_to.name: pika
dependent_to.description: C++ runtime system for parallellism and concurrency.
